translations: n.习惯，熟习；[生理] 习惯化

phrs.translation: 习惯化, 习惯性, 适应性, 成瘾
服药习惯化, 药物习惯性, 习惯性
习惯化范式, 习惯化研究

sentences.sentence: Tolerance may lead to habituation, in which the person becomes so dependent on the drug that he or she becomes addicted to it.
sentences.translation: 容忍可能导致习惯化，在这种情况下，人变得如此依赖毒品，以至于他或她对毒品上瘾。

sentences.sentence: If the infant fails to dishabituate and continues to show habituation with the new stimulus, it is assumed that the baby is unable to perceive the new stimulus as different.
sentences.translation: 如果婴儿并未表现出不习惯，且继续表现出对新刺激的适应，那么就可以假定，婴儿无法识别出新的刺激有什么不同。
